title: Home
description: Body Balance Chiropractic provides chiropractic care. Dr. Robert Allred is a Logan Chiropractor, call us today at 435-755-3432!
cleaned_text: Compassionate Chiropractic Care Body Balance Chiropractic utilizes many different techniques to meet your needs and to better service our patients. The committment to better our patients lives through chiropractic care is the underlying passion to Dr. Allred's treatments and facility. Mention this website and receive your first visit, which includes consultation, exam and x-rays (if needed) for $59. (Due to legal restrictions, this offer is not available to patients with state or federally funded healthcare plans such as Medicaid and Medicare.)
